Body:
orig = np.array([[np.nan, 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5, 7.5, 8.5], [np
    .nan, 0.5, 2.5, 6.5, 12.5, 20.5, 30.5, 42.5, 56.5, 72.5]])
dforig = pd.DataFrame({'0': orig[0], '1': orig[1]}).dropna()
l1 = range(10)
l2 = [(i ** 2) for i in range(10)]
df = pd.DataFrame({'0': l1, '1': l2})
res = sma(df, span=2).dropna()
assert all((dforig == res).all())
